remarks: The weak direction of the modular law (e.g. ~ pmod2iN ) that holds in any lattice.  (Contributed by NM, 11-May-2012.)
statement:
modle.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
modle.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
modle.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
modle.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
mod2ile $p |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( Z .<_ X -> ( ( X ./\ Y ) .\/ Z ) .<_ ( X ./\ ( Y .\/ Z ) ) ) ) $.
